Author: Haplo064
Name: Accurate CountDown
Description: Shows the current countdown time.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Adventurer in Need
Description: Recieve a notification when a duty roulette is in need of a role. /pbonus to setup

Author: Ms.Tress
Name: Aether Sense (18+)
Description: Elevate your gaming experience to gaming euphoria with integrated adult intimate hardware. Requires a Buttplug.io library server, such as Intiface Desktop: https://intiface.com/desktop/

Author: Ottermandias
Name: AutoVisor
Description: Automatically change visor, headslot hiding, and weapon hiding status for different player states, as well as default CPoses per job.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Better Party Finder
Description:
Filter the party finder better.

All vanilla filtering is available, plus:

- Create filter presets to easily switch between
- Whitelist/blacklist specific duties and categories
- Add character names to hide PFs from
- Remove PFs above maximum item level
- Filter on item level range
- Filter on multiple jobs and slots (ex. MCH + GNB available)

Author: ackwell
Name: Browser Host
Description:
Dalamud plugin for in-game browser rendering. Think OverlayPlugin, but it's in the game itself.
Use the settings button below or the '/bh config' command to configure.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Burnt Toast
Description: Hides toast notifications you don't want to see.

Author: Haplo064
Name: Chat Bubbles
Description: Enables in-game chat bubbles.

Author: kij
Name: ChatCoordinates
Description: Places flag marker on map from coordinates in chat. "/coord help" or "/ctp help" for more info.

Author: Haplo064
Name: Chat Extender
Description: This plugin adds functionality to FFXIV in-game chat.

Author: Haplo064
Name: Chat Translator
Description: Enables in-game chat translation.

Author: Chivalrik
Name: Compass
Description: Monodimensional compass for your adventures.

Author: goat
Name: Character Data Sync
Description: This plugin allows you to use your character data from your main character on all others.

Author: goat, modded by Franz
Name: Discord Chat Bridge
Description: This plugin allows you to receive your chat messages inside of discord.

Author: goat
Name: Fancy Loading Screens
Description: This plugin shows the destination zone's concept art while loading.

Author: goat
Name: Discord Rich Presence
Description: This plugin allows you display your character and current zone in your Discord profile.

Author: goat
Name: Hey Dalamud!
Description:
The intelligent voice assistant for your FFXIV experience - teleport to places, open other plugins, the possibilities are limitless!
Just say "Hey Dalamud, help me!" to learn more.

Author: perchbird
Name: Damage Info
Description: Configurable UI options for extra damage information. /dmginfo displays the config.

Author: Strati
Name: DeepDungeonDex
Description:
A live bestiary for Deep Dungeon. Shows target mob aggro type, a subjective threat level, vulnerability to stun, and a general overview of notable mechanics. Threat level is meant to be taken with a grain of salt, is aimed towards solo players, and assumes a general familiarity with
deep dungeon mechanics and the class being played. Information is accurate to the best of my knowledge based on crowdsourced information, but please open an issue on the GitHub or ping me in either the Deep Dungeons or QuickLauncher Discord servers if anything is found to be inaccurate or if you'd like to make a report on untested data.

Author: ocealot
Name: EasyEyes
Description: Hides VFXs which are too bright or distracting

Author: Dante Souza e Souza - aka lokinmodar
Name: Echoglossian
Description: Realtime game text translator

Author: Xorus
Name: EngageTimer
Description:
Combat Timer for OBS and ingame overlay with some benefits like a big nice countdown in the middle of the screen in the style of the original one.
Please consult the repository link for OBS setup instructions.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Expanded Search Info
Description:
Displays extra information pulled from search info when examining.

Support for:
- Any plain text URL
- Pastebin.com
- carrd.co/crd.co
- F-List
- Refsheet

Simply examine someone with a search info containing pointers to one of
these locations and the plugin will display information automatically.

Author: BiscuitUmU, Kazumi
Name: Fantasy Player
Description:
Control Spotify playback from within FFX|V
Use the button below to open settings or use the '/pfp settings' command.

Author: daemitus
Name: ezFauxHollows
Description: Highlights recommended tiles in Faux Hollows for your next move.

Author: CFG
Name: FC Name Color
Description: Color your FC's tag or the entire nameplate if they are in your FC. Use /fcnc to open up the config.

Author: Caraxi
Name: FPS Plugin
Description: Display game FPS.

Author: Ottermandias
Name: GatherBuddy
Description: Adds commands to simplify gathering by finding nodes and their locations via item name and a UI to keep track of special node uptimes.

Author: Chivalrik
Name: GentleTouch
Description:
Allows one to create vibration patterns for the controller and specify triggers for them.

You need to configure patterns and triggers before it will work.
Currently supported triggers are:
- Cooldowns
- Near Aether Current

Author: ascclemens
Name: Globetrotter
Description: Automatically shows where treasure maps are located.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Good Memory
Description:
Adds an indicator in item tooltips to show whether you have acquired that item.

This indicator is in the item's description near the bottom and only appears for
items that are unlockable, such as orchestrion rolls, minions, etc.

Author: Eternita
Name: GPNotify
Description: Notifies you when your GP recovers to certain amount as gatherer, takes potion into account as well.

Author: perchbird
Name: Housemate
Description:
Displays information about housing fixtures and objects.
/housemate opens the UI.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Item Search
Description: Search for items. Type /xlitem to open search window.

Author: ocealot
Name: JobBars
Description: Additional job gauges and party buff trackers

Author: haplo, daemitus
Name: JobIcons
Description: Names are dumb, use icons instead.

Author: kalilistic
Name: Kapture
Description: Track your loot.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Macro Chain
Description: Allows macros to continue into the next macro

Author: Bluefissure
Name: MapLinker
Description: Automatically record the maplinks in chat and retrieval later.

Author: fmauNeko
Name: Market board
Description: Browse the market board. /pmb to open.

Author: daemitus
Name: ezMiniCactpot
Description: Highlights recommended tiles in Mini Cactpot for your next move.

Author: attick
Name: Mouseover Action
Description: This plugin allows for macro-like use of actions without any macro delay. /pmoaction to open UI

Author: karashiiro
Name: NeatNoter
Description: A note-taking plugin.

Author: ascclemens
Name: NoSoliciting
Description:
Customisable chat and Party Finder filtering. In addition to letting
you filter anything from chat and PF, it comes with built-in filters
for the following:

- RMT (both gil and content)
- FC ads
- RP ads
- Phishing messages
- Static recruitment
- Trade ads
- Community ads
- Any PF with an item level over the max

Author: Avaflow
Name: Oops, All Lalafells!
Description:
Turn everyone around you into Lalafells (or other races)!

Use /poal to open settings.

Author: meli & perchbird
Name: Orchestrion Plugin
Description: Adds a simple front-end for browsing and changing the in-game BGM.  /porch to open

Author: goat, modded by Franz
Name: OwO
Description: This plugin uwu's your chat.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Peeping Tom
Description: Shows who is currently or was previously targeting you.

Author: tesu
Name: Penny Pincher
Description: Copies 1 below the cheapest offer to your clipboard when you check marketboard prices. /penny help

Author: karashiiro
Name: PingPlugin
Description: A ping display plugin for Dalamud.

Author: Haplo064
Name: Pixel Perfect
Description: Adds an indicator of your hitbox.

Author: kalilistic
Name: PlayerTrack
Description: Keep track of players you meet.

Author: perchbird
Name: PrefPro
Description: Changes in-game dialogue to your desired gender and name. /prefpro for the menu.

Author: kalilistic
Name: PriceCheck
Description: Quickly price check your items.

Author: UnknownX
Name: QoL Bar
Description:
A plugin designed to provide a simple, customizable and always available interface for chat commands
or other plugins to alleviate the need for using macros and hotbar space to achieve similar results.

The plugin should initially appear as a small box on the bottom center of the game window.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Quest Map
Description:
Explore quests and their rewards.
- Search for quest names or their rewards, including instances,
  beast tribes, minions, etc.
- See an interactive map of quest requirements and unlocks.
- Open a quest info window even for quests you haven't completed.
- Open quest starting locations on the map or open quests in the journal.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Remind Me
Description: Cooldown and Status tracking.

Author: Ottermandias
Name: RezPls
Description: Easy overview about who is currently resurrecting who, who is already resurrected, and who has removable detrimental status effects.

Author: kalilistic
Name: SillyChat
Description: Make chat more fun with translations like pirate and urianger.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Tweaks
Description:
A collection of Quality of Life tweaks. Aiming to improve the experience without changing anything drastically.
All changes are toggleable, with everything disabled by default. Visit the Repo for a full list of tweaks. (Globe icon below)

Author: Haplo064
Name: SlideCast
Description: Adds an indicator of when it's safe to move while casting

Author: Sonar Team
Name: Sonar
Punchline: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays.
Description: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays. /sonar to open, /sonarconfig to configure. This plugin is closed source and support is only provided in the Sonar Support discord.
Changelog: See the Sonar Support discord #announcements channel for more information

Author: ascclemens
Name: Sound Filter
Description:
Filters any sound or set of sounds from the game.

- Remove a battle sound effect you don't like
- Remove specific emote sounds
- Remove specific background music

Author: karashiiro
Name: SoundSetter
Description: A Dalamud plugin that allows volume control from anywhere, including gpose and cutscenes.

Author: Pohky
Name: Teleporter
Description: Chat Commands for teleporting to Aetherytes. /tp for help

Author: ascclemens
Name: Text Box Styler
Description: Allows replacing every text box with the background of your choice.

Author: karashiiro
Name: TextToTalk
Description: Chat TTS. Use /tttconfig to configure the enabled channels and triggers/exceptions.

Author: ascclemens
Name: The Great Separator
Description:
Add separators to various numbers.

- Damage/healing numbers (not DoTs or other players' numbers)
- Party list HP
- Ability costs on hotbars
- Ability costs in tooltips

Author: attick & perchbird
Name: TitleEdit
Description: Create, share, and shuffle custom title screens for FFXIV.

Author: ascclemens
Name: Tourist
Description:
Tourist adds a window to assist with the sightseeing log.

- Show when sightseeing log vistas are available
- Add markers for ARR vistas
- Open vista locations on your map
- Hide already completed or unavailable vistas
- Show the command needed for each vista

Author: ocealot
Name: VFXEditor
Description: VFX editor and browser, open with /vfxedit

Author: Dragon
Name: Visibility
Description:
Allows you to hide players, pets chocobos and minions.
Includes VoidList, which is a better blacklist.
Accessible via /pvis
More information available via /xlhelp

Author: Haplo064
Name: VoidList
Description: Completely removes chosen players from your game.

Author: PunishedPineapple
Name: Waymark Preset Plugin
Description: Manage waymark presets.  Use "/pwaymark help" for more information.

Author: Azure Gem
Name: Window Title Changer
Description: Allows you to change your game window title

Author: Haplo064
Name: Where's WOLdo
Description: Text overlay of current location name.

Author: daemitus
Name: ezWondrousTails
Description: Adds row probabilities to the Wondrous Tails display.

Author: ascclemens
Name: XIVChat Server
Description:
XIVChat is a suite of software allowing you to use FFXIV's chat from
different devices. This is the server component required to do so.

For information about clients to use with this server, see the website.

Author: attick
Name: XIV Combo
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. /pcombo to open menu

Author: zhudotexe
Name: PaissaHouse
Description:
Looking for that perfect house? PaissaHouse lets you receive notifications when a new plot of land is up for sale on your home world.

Want to contribute? Check out the repository (globe icon below) for instructions.

Author: Franz
Name: ChatTyper
Description: Prefixes all chatbox messages with their chat types.

Author: DelvUI
Name: DelvUI
Description: Provides an ElvUI style HUD for FFXIV.  All support for this plugin is handled at discord.gg/delvui

Author: aers
Name: EnemyListDebuffs
Description: Displays your debuffs on the enemy list.

Author: Franz
Name: FlashOnTell
Description: Flash FFXIV's program on the taskbar when you receive a /tell. This plugin has no configurable settings at this time.

Author: aers
Name: FlyTextFilter
Description: Filter fly text by type.

Author: Gotest
Name: Kingdom Hearts UI Bars
Description: A plugin that makes Kingdom Hearts UI stuff, such as a health bar for the player.

Author: Talim
Name: MPTimer
Description: Simple MP timer status bar for black mages. Shows the time until your next MP tick, and optionally shows a marker indicating when it is safe to cast Fire III without losing an MP tick.

Author: aers
Name: NamePlateDebuffs
Description: Displays your debuffs on enemy nameplates.

Author: Bluefissure
Name: No Kill Plugin
Description: A simple plugin that prevent the game from killing itself with lobby error.

Author: Sl0nderman
Name: Ocean Fishin'
Description: Suggests bait while ocean fishing.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Party List Layout
Description: Customize the layout of the party list.

Author: Eternita
Name: QuestAWAY
Description: Removes unwanted icons from your map.

Author: Chalkos
Name: RepairMe
Description: Helps you notice when your gear needs to be repaired or has materia to be extracted. /repairme to config

Author: akira0245
Name: Reset dummy enmity command
Description: A text command for reset target striking dummy enmity.

Author: Dragon
Name: Side HUD
Description: Provides fancy side HUD

Author: ocealot
Name: SkillSwap
Description: Create animation replacement mods for Textools or Penumbra

Author: Avaflow
Name: TabTab
Description: Customise the behaviour of tab targeting. Use /ptab to open configuration.

Author: Cadaeix
Name: XIVLogger
Description: Save chat logs as text files from when this is loaded. /xivlogger for settings, /savelog to save logs, /copylogs to copy logs.
